name: ERPNext
natural_language_description: 这是 ERPNext 节点。主要用于: Consume ERPNext API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: document

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Retrieve many documents

docType.name: docType
docType.description: The type of document you would like to update. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
docType.natural_language_description: 参数名: DocType Name or ID | 作用: The type of document you would like to update. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 10

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: fields (值: None) - Comma-separated list of fields to return. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

properties.name: properties
properties.natural_language_description: 参数名: Properties | 作用: Properties of request body | 默认值: {}

documentName.name: documentName
documentName.description: The name (ID) of document you would like to get
documentName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Document Name | 作用: The name (ID) of document you would like to get | (必填项)
